response.overview: Big black asses XXX! Vouyer Media contract actor/director Jack Napier is back in the saddle again - and basking in the acclaim that comes with winning AVN's coveted Best Interracial Series award for two years running.  Hot on the heels of this triumph, he's bringing you one of the finest editions yet in his signature all-black line. AVN has nominated the Black Bottom Girls franchise for 'Best Ethnic Series - Black' every year since the franchise began, and Black Bottom Girls #7 is likely to take the fame and acclaim to new heights, featuring McKenzie Sweet and Evanni Solei!
response.title: Black Bottom Girls 7
